reviews.review:
Being back to CS after a yeeears long break, we're talking last played back when it was called 1.6, well, its pretty great :)

Although i strongly advice you to get Prime, playing without(especially in casual) theres just cheaters everywhere, out of 5 matches, 4 has a cheater in it. And this is not just the "omg he shot me without knowing blabla" kind of whine, its from having spectated and clearly seeing players look at the enemy through the wall, its insane AimBot where the character spins around like a mofo

But apart from that, nice game ^^
best fps game. and good server but some players are really toxic discriminating others races.
wurde für 1 woche gebannt weil ich meine teammates gekillt habe weil sie in mein schussfeuer reingelaufen sind
Quel plaisir quand on devient bon à ce jeu !!!

İyi bir rusça dersi almak istiyorsanız tam aradığınız uygulama .d
Really nice game hope others see it in the same way I do!
Det här spelet är jätte roligt och jag rekommenderar det till alla. CS.GO är ett spel där det behövs ett ex. antal timmar för att bli bra.
Ужасная игра, куча читеров, чтобы прогресировать нужно на этой игре жениться. Отвратительное комьюнити. Прайм дело не испровляет, всё так же куча читеров, не тратьте своё время на это говно
